segments.text: Are you going to watch the Indy Five Hundred on TV this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not really into racecar driving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were when we were in high school . That , and baseball .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , well , times change . Look at you-you're a father now . You can't say that you haven't changed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True , but I still have to watch my baseball . The season's in full swing now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean , I know spring training's over , but I'm just not into all that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello ? Is the real Taylor in there ?
segments.speaker: S1
